title: 12/11/2020 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 12/11/2020 - Best of The Herd
description:
-The Patriots system doesn't work because they have no talent

-Big Ben being asked to throw too much is why the Steelers won't win Super Bowl

-The Rams are great when they can write the script

-Colin's Super Bowl bubble will make fans of AFC North teams very upset

-Cam Newton and Russell Westbrook are aging poorly


Guest: Eric Mangini, former Browns & Jets Head Coach



Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
